From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Monday, July 22, 2024 4:30 PM
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >; Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >
Cc: Samira Batisse <Samira.Batisse@chalhoub.com <mailto:Samira.Batisse@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Claims Intimation - Versace Tower Barocco - Tanagra Marina Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Monday, July 22, 2024 4:30 PM
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >; Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >

Subject: Claims Intimation - Versace Tower Barocco - Tanagra Marina Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Monday, July 22, 2024 4:30 PM
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >; Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >

Subject: Claims Intimation - Versace Tower Barocco - Tanagra Marina Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Monday, July 22, 2024 4:30 PM
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >; Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >
Cc: Samira Batisse <Samira.Batisse@chalhoub.com <mailto:Samira.Batisse@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Claims Intimation - Versace Tower Barocco - Tanagra Marina Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

M.C.T. FZE

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

I am writing to inform you of a recent incident at Tanagra Marina Mall, specifically involving a Versace Tower Barocco product. 

 

The incident occurred at the following location:

 

MARINA MALL - Tanagra - Unit no.GM8/GM9 - Ground Floor

 

Incident Details:
On July 15, 2024, a customer was attempting to open the lid of the box, and unfortunately, it fell to the shop floor, causing it to crack and the Versace logo to become dismantled. We have attached images and a video of the damaged item involved for your reference. The incident has been recorded under JIRA # INV23131, and the Retail Sale Price (RSP) of the item is AED 25,500.

 

We kindly request you to proceed with filing the necessary claim under the policy held by Allied Enterprises.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​
